subject: I know it will be a great surp
body:
I know it will be a great surprise reading from me
today but consider This divine intervention as a pastor explained to
my understanding. I'm Mrs. Sherry Ballou, I'm a widow from
USA, I am writing you from my sick bed because I have been fighting
cancer for a while now, I will tell you more about myself and also explain
why I need your help. Please write me soon as possible, my health is pretty
bad and my Doctors say I will be moved to the intensive care unit.
I hope I can trust you! please do pray for me, I wait for your email
feedback Thanks!

subject: Re: I know it will be a great surp
body:
Hello Mrs. Sherry Ballou,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition. It must be a tough time for you. I appreciate your trust in reaching out to me and I will certainly keep you in my prayers.

Could you please share more about yourself? And how may I assist you during this difficult time? Please remember, I'm here to help within my capabilities.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Margaret
